Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows the implementation of body cameras on police officers notwithstanding binding arbitration
Summary: Allows the implementation of body cameras on police officers notwithstanding binding arbitration.
LawCode: Amd ยง204-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to allowing the implementation of body cameras on police officers notwithstanding binding arbitration
